sn7.20:4.2: Atha kho bhikkhako brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.20:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn7.20:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho bhikkhako brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.20:4.6: “ahampi kho, bho gotama, bhikkhako, bhavampi bhikkhako, idha no kiṃ nānākaraṇan”ti?
sn7.20:7.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhako brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.20:7.2: “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
sn7.20:7.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
